abstract: Squarely in his element, Rick Santorum asserted himself as a moral leader and pitched his 0-0-0 economic plan at the Values Voter Summit.
snippet: Squarely in his element, Rick Santorum asserted himself as a moral leader and pitched his 0-0-0 economic plan at the Values Voter Summit.

headline.main: Santorum Calls Morality Crucial to Economic Success
